knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Bring in imports


```{r cars}
library(MLDataR)
library(tidymodels)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(stacks)
library(skimr)

```

## Load in the dataaset

The dataset for our example will be the Thyroid dataset contained in the `MLDataR` package.

```{r dataset_include}
td <- MLDataR::thyroid_disease
skim(td)
```
